itemDescription: younger son of Henry Lascelles, 6th Earl of Harewood

wikipedia_page.main: Gerald David Lascelles (21 August 1924 – 27 February 1998) was the younger son of Henry Lascelles, 6th Earl of Harewood and Mary, Princess Royal, the only daughter of King George V and Queen Mary. He was a first cousin of Queen Elizabeth II. He was styled The Honourable Gerald Lascelles.

response: * The Hon. Gerald David Lascelles (born at Goldsborough Hall 21 August 1924 – died 27 February 1998)
* 21 August – Gerald David Lascelles, nobleman and cousin of Queen Elizabeth II (died 1998)
* Gerald David Lascelles (1924–1998), younger son of 6th Earl of Harewood and Princess Mary, Princess Royal, President of the British Racing Drivers' Club from 1964 to 1991
